entities.name: cassandra trelawney
entities.description: Cassandra Trelawney is mentioned as a celebrated Seer, implying she has the ability to see into the future. She is also mentioned as being a great-great-grandmother of Professor Trelawney.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is mentioned as the great-great-granddaughter of Cassandra Trelawney and has second sight, implying she also has the ability to see into the future.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is mentioned as making notes and asking Professor Trelawney to make a prediction for her, implying she is interested in the ability of others to see into the future.

relationships.description: Cassandra Trelawney is mentioned as being the great-great-grandmother of Professor Trelawney, establishing a familial relationship between them.

Professor Umbridge is interested in the ability of others to see into the future, specifically mentioning that Professor Trelawney's great-great-grandmother had this ability. This implies a relationship between Cassandra Trelawney and Professor Umbridge as an ancestor of interest.
Professor Trelawney is mentioned as being the great-great-granddaughter of Cassandra Trelawney, establishing a familial relationship between them.
Professor Umbridge asks Professor Trelawney to make a prediction for her, establishing a relationship between them as requester and predictor.
